Judul: Boost your research career  Five scientists offer tips on how to land a rewarding job and make the most of your science.
Abstrak:
Academic scientists who want a job in industry 
need to get into an industrial mindset, and 
that starts with the right CV. I’ve seen it time 
and time again: academics use the same CV 
whether they’re applying for a job at a pharma
-
ceutical company or an assistant professorship 
at a university. That’s no way to get hired. If 
you’ve sent out 50 CVs without a response, you 
need to rethink your approach.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
